sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Use this action to generate a table record link to be used within journal fields, html supporting fields etc.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Creates a table record link to be used in journal fields and HTML body text

Inputs:
Table Name - string value of table name, e.g incident
Record SysID - string value of table record sysID, e.g 32 character sys ID
Link Display Name - Value to display as the hyperlink for the record, e.g INC0000031
Portal URL Suffix - URL suffix used to access the portal as defined in sp_portal, e.g default: sp

Output:
Different links to be used in the Native UI (used by ITIL users) and Portals (used by end users)

sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Generate Record Link for Email

sys_variable_value.value: (function execute(inputs, outputs) { var portal_html_NO_STYLE ="" + "" + inputs['linkdisplayname'] + "" + ""; var portal_html="" + inputs['linkdisplayname'] + ""; outputs['portal_html'] = portal_html; })(inputs, outputs);

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.annotation: Use this action to generate a table record link to be used within journal fields, html supporting fields etc.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Creates a table record link to be used in journal fields and HTML body text

Inputs:
Table Name - string value of table name, e.g incident
Record SysID - string value of table record sysID, e.g 32 character sys ID
Link Display Name - Value to display as the hyperlink for the record, e.g INC0000031
Portal URL Suffix - URL suffix used to access the portal as defined in sp_portal, e.g default: sp

Output:
Different links to be used in the Native UI (used by ITIL users) and Portals (used by end users)
